gameSpeed1.comment: Game minutes elapsing per second on lowest speed setting.

gameSpeed2.comment: Game minutes elapsing per second on second lowest speed setting.

gameSpeed3.comment: Game minutes elapsing per second on second highest speed setting.

gameSpeed4.comment: Game minutes elapsing per second on highest speed setting.

airCombatSpeed1.comment: Air combat speed multiplier in the air combat UI

airCombatSpeed2.comment: Air combat speed multiplier in the air combat UI

airCombatSpeed3.comment: Air combat speed multiplier in the air combat UI

airCombatSpeed4.comment: Air combat speed multiplier in the air combat UI

startingMoney.comment: The Xenonaut funds on new game start (before buying first base)

newBaseCost.comment: The cost for a new base

radarRange1.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 1 radar built.

radarRange2.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 2 radars built.

radarRange3.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 3 radars built.

radarRange4.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 4 radars built.

radarRange5.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 5 radars built.

radarRange6.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 6 radars built.

radarRange7.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 7 radars built.

radarRange8.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 8 radars built.

radarRange9.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 9 radars built.

radarRange10.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 10 radars built.

radarRange11.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 11 radars built.

radarRange12.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 12 radars built.

radarRange13.comment: This is the detection range in KM of a base with 13 radars built.

trackingRange.comment: The radar tracking range multiplier. Radars will continue to track acquired UFOs within this range but will not detect additional UFOs.

showPossibleRadarRanges.comment: Show what radar ranges a base about to be built would have with 2 and 3 radars.

scientistCost.comment: The initial hire cost for a scientist and his monthly wage.

technicianCost.comment: The initial hire cost for an engineer and his monthly wage.

soldierCost.comment: The initial hire cost for a soldier and his monthly wage.

minSoldierAge.comment: The minimal age of a soldier.

maxSoldierAge.comment: The maximal age of a soldier.

femaleSoldierChance.comment: The percent chance that a generated soldier is a female

soldierStats.comment: Soldier's stats are generated with values in the specified range.

startingSoldiersStatBonus.comment: Bonus applied to starting soldiers' stats

APProgress.comment: A progress point is earned every time a soldier spends a TU on a mission

strengthProgress.comment: Points are given when soldier moves one tile while carrying more than strengthCoeff percent of its maximum carry weight

accuracyProgress.comment: Points are given when a soldier attempts to fire at a valid hostile enemy within weapon range * 1.5

reflexesProgress.comment: A progress point is gained when a soldier performs a Reaction Fire test (it doesn't matter whether he passes or fails it)

braveryProgress.comment: A progress point is earned whenever a soldier panics in battle

resilienceProgress.comment: A progress points is earned every time the soldier gets a skillup in any other attribute

BaseSoldierCarryingCapacity.comment: This value is used to calculate soldier carrying capacity.

SoldierCarryingCapacityStrengthMul.comment: The percentage of soldier strength used in the carrying capacity formula.

limitCarryCapacityMul.comment: Soldier's carry capacity is multiplicated by this number to get the point at which a soldier will be left at 0 TUs

soldierUnrecoverableHitPoints.comment: Soldiers whose health is at or below this number will never be recovered

soldierBaseRecoveryChance.comment: The base recovery chance at 0 HP. This is B in the recovery formula

soldierRecoveryDecreaseCoefficient.comment: Recovery chance drops by this many percent for every HP below zero - this is C in the formula

overkillDamage.comment: Soldiers whose HP drop below this value will be considered to have been killed with overdamage. Specify a negative number (e.g. -50) to activate. If set to 0 or greater, this is not triggered

afterBurnerFuelMultiplier.comment: Afterburner fuel consumption multiplier when active.

refuelRate.comment: The percent refueling rate for aircraft

repairRate.comment: The percent repairing rate for aircraft

rearmTime.comment: Minutes needed to rearm each weapon slot of an airplane

recoverTime.comment: Hours needed to recover an airplane from 0% to 1% (Above 1% will use repairRate)

airCombatAIThinkChance.comment: This controls UFO AI thinking in Air Combat. The higher this value is (between 0 and 1), the more likely UFOs will each second consider swapping to a better target.

airCombatDamageRandomChance.comment: Damage spread of weapons in air combat (+/-%)

airplaneRecovery.comment: If set to 1, lost airplanes will be recovered. Otherwise they are permanently destroyed

airCombatEngageDistance.comment: The distance (in km) at which an intercepting airplane engages an ufo (or viceversa)

airCombatAICurage.comment: This controls the bravery of UFOs in Air Combat. The lower this value is (between 0 and 1), the less likely UFOs are to flee.

ufoEscortInboundFactor.comment: How much UFO escorts will face towards interceptors at the beginning of Air Combat. From 0 (=normal heading) to 1 (=directly towards interceptors).

continentInitRelationNA.comment: The initial relations value for North America.

continentInitRelationCA.comment: The initial relations value for Central America.

continentInitRelationSA.comment: The initial relations value for South America.

continentInitRelationEU.comment: The initial relations value for Europe.

continentInitRelationRU.comment: The initial relations value for USSR.

continentInitRelationNAF.comment: The initial relations value for North Africa.

continentInitRelationSAF.comment: The initial relations value for South Africa.

continentInitRelationME.comment: The initial relations value for Middle East.

continentInitRelationIN.comment: The initial relations value for Indochina.

continentInitRelationAA.comment: The initial relations value for Australasia.

continentModNA.comment: North America modifies its funding by this value.

continentModCA.comment: Central America modifies its funding by this value.

continentModSA.comment: South America modifies its funding by this value.

continentModEU.comment: Europe modifies its funding by this value.

continentModRU.comment: USSR modifies its funding by this value.

continentModNAF.comment: North Africa modifies its funding by this value.

continentModSAF.comment: South Africa modifies its funding by this value.

continentModME.comment: Middle East modifies its funding by this value.

continentModIN.comment: Indochina modifies its funding by this value.

continentModAA.comment: Australasia modifies its funding by this value.

forecastChangeRounding.comment: The forecast funding change shown on geoscape will be rounded to multiples of this value

forecastChangeImpreciseLevel.comment: The forecast funding change shown on geoscape will be shown as text depending on (not) exceeding this this value, if not 0.

relationsCap.comment: Multiplied by the starting relations score for each region to give the maximum value that nations relations can reach

terrorFailurePenalty.comment: Penalty applied to the region relations when a terror event results in failure (no engagement by Xenonauts or GC loss)

aerialTerrorFailurePenalty.comment: Penalty applied to the region relations when an Aerial Terror event results in failure (no engagement by Xenonauts or AC loss)

terrorSuccessBonus.comment: Bonus granted to the region relations if a terror site is successfully secured

terrorCivilianSurvivedBonus.comment: Extra relations bonus for every civilian that survived a terror mission

terrorLocalForcesSurvivedBonus.comment: Extra relations bonus for every local forces fighter that survived a terror mission

crashsiteFundingBonus.comment: Controls whether doing crash sites grants a relations bonus with the region

crashsiteFundingModifier.comment: If relations bonus for crash sites is enabled, the bonus is the shootdown bonus multiplied by this value

alienAITickerIdle.comment: The ticker will increase by this amount every in-game minute, irrespective of whether any alien activity is taking place. This is to force the invasion forwards even if the player is playing extremely well.

alienWavePeriod.comment: This is the base value for time between UFO attack waves at the start of the game. It will fall as the alien ticker score increases.

alienWavePeriodVariation.comment: Percent variation added or subtracted to alienWavePeriod

alienWavePeriodMultiplier.comment: The time between UFO attack waves is reduced by the alien ticker score multiplied by this value.

alienMissionMaxStartDelay.comment: Maximum time (in minutes) between wave spawn time and each single alien mission spawn

reinforcementChance.comment: This is the percentage chance that a UFO that escapes to space after escaping air combat will return in the next UFO wave and attempt to complete its mission.

minimumMissionsLandTime.comment: The minimum landing time (in minutes) for the alien missions

alienBaseDiscoveryChance.comment: This is the percentage chance for an alien base to be discovered automatically whenever a check is performed using the value below.

alienBaseReportChance.comment: This is the percentage chance that an alien base will be reported with its approximate location in the event log

alienBaseReportPreciseChance.comment: If a base is getting reported (previous variable), this is the chance that the report will have a more precise location

alienBaseDiscoveryCycle.comment: This many days need to pass to have a chance to detect an alien base - Should this not be done on a monthly basis?

minMissionCount.comment: This is the mininum number of mission for a wave.

maxMissionCount.comment: This is the maxinum number of mission for a wave. Numbers from the next two parameters will be added to it.

maxMissionAlienBaseModifier.comment: Add this much to maxMissionCount for every alien base on the map

maxMissionHumanBaseModifier.comment: Add this much to maxMissionCount for every human base on the map

highBandTicker.comment: This is the ticker value from where the maxMissionCount missions are going to be spawned.

parabolicPower.comment: The amount of missions to spawn is: Floor(( tickerRate ^ parabolicPower) * (Max - Min)) + Min. Where tickerRate is: Min ( currentTicker / highBandTicker, 1),

mediumAlienBaseTickerLimit.comment: Alien bases are medium sized above this ticker value.

largeAlienBaseTickerLimit.comment: Alien bases are large sized above this ticker value.

independentAlienBaseGrowth.comment: If set to 1, each alien base will grow independently of the AI ticker

alienBaseGrowthPerDay.comment: If bases grow independently, each base will grow this much per day

alienBaseStartingTickerMultiplier.comment: If bases grow independenly, new bases will start at AI ticker times this value

alienBaseSupplyGrowth.comment: If bases grow independently, each successful Supply Run mission will increase base ticker by this much

xenonautBaseRetakeWindow.comment: If greater than 0, Xenonaut bases that have been lost in combat will be replaced by an alien base, and can be recaptured in this many hours

xenonautAlienBaseTickerConstant.comment: An alien base created in place of a Xenonaut base will have its ticker set to: xenonautAlienBaseTickerConstant + (global alien ticker * xenonautAlienBaseTickerMultiplier)

xenonautAlienBaseTickerMultiplier.comment: An alien base created in place of a Xenonaut base will have its ticker set to: xenonautAlienBaseTickerConstant + (global alien ticker * xenonautAlienBaseTickerMultiplier)

useXenonautBaseTilesetForRetakeMissions.comment: If 1, Xenonaut base retake missions will take place in the Xenonaut base map instead of the alien base map. The mechanics of such missions are similar to regular base defense except for Xenonauts getting the first turn

lostBaseEvacuation.comment: If 1, and retaking Xenonaut bases is enabled, then airplanes and staff from lost bases will evacuate as possible. As possible means the game looks if other bases have free space available for engineers/scientists and aircraft and transfers them automatically.

researchTicksPerMinute.comment: An alien research mission generates this many alien ticker points per minute of the UFO being on the map.

researchAbductionEventChance.comment: An alien research mission has this percentage chance of generating an Abduction event each hour.

groundAttackTicksPerMinute.comment: An alien ground attack mission generates this many alien ticker points per minute of the UFO being on the map.

groundAttackGAEventChance.comment: An alien ground attack mission has this percentage chance of generating a Minor Ground Attack event per hour.

groundAttackAirlinerEventChance.comment: An alien ground attack mission has this many percent chance of generating an Airliner Destroyed event per hour.

bombingRunTicksPerMinute.comment: An alien bombing run mission generates this many alien ticker points per minute of the UFO being on the map.

bombingRunGAEventChance.comment: An alien bombing run mission has this percentage chance of generating a Major Ground Attack event per hour.

bombingRunAerialTerrorChance.comment: An alien ground attack mission has this percentage chance of generating an Aerial Terror event per hour.

aerialTerrorMissionDuration.comment: Aerial terror missions will last for a number of hours in this range

alienBaseTickerPerMinute.comment: An alien base generates this many ticker points per minute after being built, even if undetected.

supplyRunTicker.comment: A successful alien supply run mission to a base generates this many ticker points.

alienBaseRelationsDamagePerDay.comment: An alien base damages relations in its continent by this much every day (24 hours)

airSuperiorityTicksPerMinute.comment: An alien air superiority mission generates this many ticker points per minute the UFO is on the map.

airSuperiorityAirlinerEventChance.comment: An alien air superiority mission has this percentage chance per hour of generating an Airliner Destroyed event.

airSuperiorityCooldownTime.comment: After having engaged in air combat, an alien air superiority mission won't intercept Xenonauts airplanes for this many hours

baseAttackMissionDelay.comment: Minimum time elapsed between two base attack missions, in days

terrorMissionDelay.comment: Minimum time elapsed between two terror missions, in days

terrorMissionDuration.comment: Terror missions will last for a number of hours in this range

scoutTicksPerMinute.comment: An alien scout mission generates this many alien ticker points per minute of the UFO being on the map.

constructionMissionTickerLimit1.comment: Alien construction missions will be delayed by constructionMissionDelay1 if the ticker is greater than this.

constructionMissionTickerLimit2.comment: Alien construction missions will be delayed by constructionMissionDelay2 if the ticker is greater than this.

constructionMissionTickerLimit3.comment: Alien construction missions will be delayed by constructionMissionDelay3 if the ticker is greater than this.

constructionMissionDelay4.comment: Alien construction missions will be delayed by this if the ticker is smaller than constructionMissionTickerLimit3.

MaxAlienBases.comment: Maximum number of alien bases before the game stops calling additional construction missions.

ufoProtectionDistance.comment: This is the maximum distance until the AI is protecting crashed UFOs.

ufoProtectionChanceLimit.comment: This is the limit of the protection mission launch.

customSoldierCreationChance.comment: This is the chance that a custom soldier will be brought instead of a normal one.

labSpacePerBuilding.comment: Lab space will be increased per laboratory.

manSpacePerBuilding.comment: Workshop space will be increased per workshop.

livSpacePerBuilding.comment: Living space will be increased per living quarters.

powerCoresExplodeChance.comment: The chance that UFO power cores will explode on UFO crash.

powerCoreExplosionRadius.comment: The blast radius of the power core when it explodes on crash

powerCoreFireChance.comment: The % chance a tile will be affected by fire when the power cores explode

killCrewOnCrashChance.comment: The chance for an alien to be killed on UFO crash when power cores don't explode.

killCrewOnPowerCoreExplodedChance.comment: The chance for an alien to be killed on UFO crash when power cores explode.

instantResearchesPopupDelay.comment: Delay before showing instant-completing researches, in hours

instantResearchesPopupDelayVariation.comment: Instant-completing researches delay will vary randomly by at most this many hours

useStaticEscortChance.comment: Sets whether the chance of a UFO spawning with an escort is a flat % drawn from the AM_* files.

ACProjMissRate.comment: Chance that a projectile misses its target in air combat. Between 0.0 and 1.0

showAIDebug.comment: When true, the ai debug panel is shown.

startingAlienTicker.comment: The game starts with this alien ticker value.

endTurnAutosave.comment: If enabled, game is autosaved right after the player's turn ends. Only for debugging purposes.

disclaimerTextTimeout.comment: The disclaimer text will be shown for this many seconds.

disclaimerTextSize.comment: The disclaimer text will be shown with this size at 1024x768 resolution.
